page.title: 04Sport and Recreation in Dav.
page.content: There are two main sports areas in Daventry. The first is at Stefan Hill on the southern outskirts of the town. This is a private club and it's main sports are Rugby, Cricket, Bowls, Athletics and Squash. This club is run as separate groups under the overall control of a central committee. The second Sports Centre is council controlled, it has only been in use since the summer of 1985. The centre provides a new all weather rubber covered, floodlit, pitch that is available for Hockey (indoor rules), Football, Tennis and Netball There is also a 25m Indoor Swimming Pool, with facilities for the disabled. The new indoor centre has a gymnasium as well as a fitness/weight room. There is also a bar in the evening.
